scripts.mobile:build: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.mobile:android: npm run mobile:build && npx cap open android
scripts.mobile:ios: npm run mobile:build && npx cap open ios
scripts.mobile:clean: npx cap clean && npm run mobile:setup
scripts.store:prepare: npm run mobile:build && echo 'Mobile apps ready for store submission!'
scripts.icons:generate: echo 'Run generate-icons.sh to create app icons'
scripts.version:bump: npm version patch && npx cap sync
